{{ msg.message }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ChatbotService } from '../chatbot.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-chatbot', templateUrl: './chatbot.component.html', styleUrls: ['./chatbot.component.scss'] }) export class ChatbotComponent implements OnInit { messages: { sender: string, message: string }[] = []; userMessage: string = ''; constructor(private chatbotService: ChatbotService) {} ngOnInit(): void {} sendMessage(): void { if (this.userMessage.trim()) { // Push user's message to the chat this.messages.push({ sender: 'user', message: this.userMessage }); // Send the user's query to the chatbot service this.chatbotService.sendQuery(this.userMessage).subscribe( (response) => { // Assuming the response is an object with a `response` key const chatbotResponse = response?.response?.response || 'No response available'; // Push the bot's response to the chat this.messages.push({ sender: 'bot', message: chatbotResponse }); this.userMessage = ''; // Clear input field after sending }, (error) => { console.error('Error:', error); this.messages.push({ sender: 'bot', message: 'Sorry, something went wrong.' }); } ); } } }
